Description: 9 beads in different shape and materials. A: One barrel-shaped bead made of white faience, with a high quality glaze. B: Two segmented cylindrical beads, made of turquoise faience. C: Five disc-shaped beads, two made of ostrich eggshell, one made of white and two made of turquoise faience. D: One discus-shaped bead with bevelled edge, made of turquoise faience in a high quality glaze.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
